Tampa.Cambridge Christian School (Tampa, Flori:
Cambridge Christian School (CCS) is a co-educational, independent Christian (non-denominational) school serving grades PreK–12, located in Tampa, Florida, United States. CCS is a college preparatory school accredited by the Florida Council of Independent Schools, Christian Schools of Florida, the National Council for Private School Accreditation, and the Florida Kindergarten Council.


== Mission ==
The mission of Cambridge Christian School is to glorify God in all the highest.
